verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) To Thee, O Lord, <WH3068> I lift <WH5375> up my soul. <WH5315>
O my God, <WH430> in Thee I trust, <WH982> Do not let me be ashamed; <WH954> Do not let my enemies <WH340> exult <WH5970> over me.

Indeed, <WH1571> none <WH3605> <WH3808> of those who wait <WH6960> for Thee will be ashamed; <WH954> Those who deal <WH898> treacherously <WH898> without <WH7387> cause <WH7387> will be ashamed. <WH954>
Make me know <WH3045> Thy ways, <WH1870> O Lord; <WH3068> Teach <WH3925> me Thy paths. <WH734>
Lead <WH1869> me in Thy truth <WH571> and teach <WH3925> me, For Thou art the God <WH430> of my salvation; <WH3468> For Thee I wait <WH6960> all <WH3605> the day. <WH3117>
Remember, <WH2142> O Lord, <WH3068> Thy compassion <WH7356> and Thy lovingkindnesses, <WH2617> For they have been from of old. <WH5769>

Do not remember <WH2142> the sins <WH9128> of my youth <WH5271> or my transgressions; <WH6588> According to Thy lovingkindness <WH2617> remember <WH2142> Thou me, For Thy goodness' sake, <WH4616> O Lord. <WH3068>
Good <WH2896> and upright <WH3477> is the Lord; <WH3068> Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> He instructs <WH3384> sinners <WH2400> in the way. <WH1870>
He leads <WH1869> the humble <WH6035> in justice, <WH4941> And He teaches <WH3925> the humble <WH6035> His way. <WH1870>
All <WH3605> the paths <WH734> of the Lord <WH3068> are lovingkindness <WH2617> and truth <WH571> To those who keep <WH5341> His covenant <WH1285> and His testimonies. <WH9381>
For Thy name's sake, <WH4616> O Lord, <WH3068> Pardon <WH5545> my iniquity, <WH5771> for it is great. <WH7227>
Who <WH4310> is the man <WH376> who fears <WH3372> the Lord <WH3068>? He will instruct <WH3384> him in the way <WH1870> he should choose. <WH977>
His soul <WH5315> will abide <WH3885> in prosperity, <WH9185> And his descendants <WH2233> will inherit <WH3423> the land. <WH776>
The secret <WH5475> of the Lord <WH3068> is for those who fear <WH3372> Him, And He will make them know <WH3045> His covenant. <WH1285>
My eyes <WH5869> are continually <WH8548> toward <WH413> the Lord, <WH3068> For He will pluck <WH3318> my feet <WH7272> out of the net. <WH7568>
Turn <WH6437> to me and be gracious <WH2603> to me, For I am lonely <WH3173> and afflicted. <WH6041>
The troubles <WH6869> of my heart <WH3824> are enlarged; <WH7337> Bring <WH3318> me out of my distresses. <WH4691>
Look <WH7200> upon my affliction <WH6040> and my trouble, <WH5999> And forgive <WH5375> all <WH3605> my sins. <WH9128>
Look <WH7200> upon my enemies, <WH340> for they are many; <WH7231> And they hate <WH8130> me with violent <WH2555> hatred. <WH8135>
Guard <WH8104> my soul <WH5315> and deliver <WH5337> me; Do not let me be ashamed, <WH954> for I take <WH2620> refuge <WH2620> in Thee.
Let integrity <WH8537> and uprightness <WH3476> preserve <WH5341> me, For I wait <WH6960> for Thee.
Redeem <WH6299> Israel, <WH3478> O God, <WH430> Out of all <WH3605> his troubles. <WH6869>
